00001 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002  *
00003  *   FILE
00004  *      pqxx/cachedresult.h
00005  *
00006  *   DESCRIPTION
00007  *      definitions for the pqxx::CachedResult class and support classes.
00008  *   pqxx::CachedResult is a lazy-fetching, transparently-cached result set

00014 #ifndef PQXX_CACHEDRESULT_H
00015 #define PQXX_CACHEDRESULT_H
00016 
00017 #include <map>

00019 #include "pqxx/cursor.h"
00020 #include "pqxx/result.h"

00022 namespace pqxx
00023 {
00024 
00025 class TransactionItf;
00026 
00027 // TODO: Forward-only mode of operation?  Or write separate stream class?
00028 
00046 class PQXX_LIBEXPORT CachedResult
00047 {
00048 public:
00049   typedef Result::size_type size_type;
00050   typedef size_type blocknum;
00051   typedef Result::Tuple Tuple;
00052 
00057   explicit CachedResult(pqxx::TransactionItf &,
00058                         const char Query[],
00059                         const PGSTD::string &BaseName="query",
00060                         size_type Granularity=100);
00061 
00062   // TODO: Iterators, begin(), end()
00063   // TODO: Metadata
00064   // TODO: Block replacement (limit cache size); then add capacity()
00065 
00066   const Tuple operator[](size_type i) const
00067   {
00068     return GetBlock(BlockFor(i))[Offset(i)];
00069   }
00070 
00071   const Tuple at(size_type i) const
00072   {
00073     return GetBlock(BlockFor(i)).at(Offset(i));
00074   }
00075 
00077 
00082   size_type size() const
00083   {
00084     if (m_Size == -1) DetermineSize();
00085     return m_Size;
00086   }
00087 
00088   
00090   bool empty() const
00091   {
00092     return (m_Size == 0) || (m_Cache.empty() && GetBlock(0).empty());
00093   }
00094 
00096   void clear();
00097 
00099   class const_iterator
00100   {
00101     const CachedResult &m_Home;
00102     CachedResult::size_type m_Row;
00103   public:
00104     explicit const_iterator(const CachedResult &Home) : m_Home(Home), m_Row(0){}
00105 
00106   private:
00107     // Not allowed:
00108     const_iterator();
00109   };
00110 
00111 private:
00112 
00113   class CacheEntry
00114   {
00115     int m_RefCount;
00116     Result m_Data;
00117 
00118   public:
00119     CacheEntry() : m_RefCount(0), m_Data() {}
00120     explicit CacheEntry(const Result &R) : m_RefCount(0), m_Data(R) {}
00121 
00122     const Result &Data() const { return m_Data; }
00123     int RefCount() const { return m_RefCount; }
00124   };
00125 
00126 
00127   blocknum BlockFor(size_type Row) const { return Row / m_Granularity; }
00128   size_type Offset(size_type Row) const { return Row % m_Granularity; }
00129 
00130   void MoveTo(blocknum) const;
00131 
00133   Result Fetch() const;
00134 
00135   Result GetBlock(blocknum b) const
00136   {
00137     CacheMap::const_iterator i = m_Cache.find(b);
00138     if (i != m_Cache.end()) return i->second.Data();
00139 
00140     MoveTo(b);
00141     return Fetch();
00142   }
00143 
00149   void DetermineSize() const;
00150 
00152   size_type m_Granularity;
00153 
00154   typedef PGSTD::map<blocknum, CacheEntry> CacheMap;
00155   mutable CacheMap m_Cache;
00156 
00157   mutable Cursor m_Cursor;
00158 
00160   mutable blocknum m_Pos;
00161 
00163   mutable size_type m_Size;
00164 
00170   mutable blocknum m_Lower, m_Upper;
00171 
00172   // Not allowed:
00173   CachedResult();
00174   CachedResult(const CachedResult &);
00175   CachedResult &operator=(const CachedResult &);
00176 };
00177
